messageBody:
Does something like this help or is it too specific?

http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=1597307&group_id=15278&atid=365278

Instead of waiting for a timeout on the test, this waits for a timeout
number of milliseconds for each Assert to become valid.

Mark
